item.title: Problems trying to generate .map from osm.pbf
item.description:
From vegeto...@gmail.com on December 23, 2010 18:05:10
Hi Guys, I followed ALL the steps trying to generate the .map and then I got stuck in "org.openstreetmap.osmosis.core.OsmosisRuntimeException: Task type mapfile-writer doesn't exist." even thought I created the folder in /home/andre/.openstreetmap/osmosis/plugin/ and dropped the mapfile plugin there
thanks in advance, Andre Mariano
Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/issues/detail?id=61

item.contents:
From thilo.mu...@gmail.com on December 23, 2010 11:08:13
Hello Andre,
can you please provide the output of the following command: ls -al /home/andre/.openstreetmap/osmosis/plugins/
Please print the full command how you are starting Osmosis ("bin/osmosis ...") with all the parameters for the mapfile-writer, maybe there is a typo somewhere.
(I assume you mean JTS 1.11 and not JTS 1.1)

From vegeto...@gmail.com on December 27, 2010 10:54:26
I don't know if it helps, but I'm running as root

From vegeto...@gmail.com on December 28, 2010 04:16:20
It took about 2 hours, but finished :D thanks guys, this worked really great! Great API you guys have thanks again!
